      • inventory

        public byte[] inventory(byte slotcnt,
                        byte maskLength,
                        byte[] mask,
                        byte maxCards)
                 throws android.os.RemoteException
        Perform an ISO15693 inventory to return all PICCs in field.
        Specified by:
        inventory in interface IICodeCard
        Parameters:
        slotcnt: - Slotcount used (16 or 1)
        maskLength: - length of the mask if available (0 - 63)
        mask: - mask to use if \a maskLength is set, otherwise NULL
        maxCards: - maximum number of cards to return (= size of \a cards)
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

        Specified by:
        sendStayQuiet in interface IICodeCard
        Parameters:

      • getPiccSystemInformation

        public byte[] getPiccSystemInformation(byte[] ProximityCard)
                                throws android.os.RemoteException
        Send command 'get system information' to retrieve information from a given or selected PICC
        Specified by:
        getPiccSystemInformation in interface IICodeCard
        Parameters:
        ProximityCard: - PICC to retrieve the information from. If card is NULL then this parameter is ignored and the information is fetched from the PICC priorly selected with #SelectPicc() 12bytes 1byte(flag byte of response)+ 1byte(Data Storage Format Identifier)+ 8byte(UID of the PICC)+ 2byte(CRC of response)
        Returns:
        success: return 15bytes, fail: return NULL, 1byte（flag byte of response）+ 1byte（info flags）+ 8byte （UID of the PICC）+ 1byte（Data Storage Format Identifier）+ 1byte（Application Family Identifier）+ 1byte（ number of blocks available）+ 1byte（number of bytes per block）+ 1byte（IC reference field ）
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • readSingleBlock

        public byte[] readSingleBlock(byte[] ProximityCard)
                       throws android.os.RemoteException
        Read a single block from a given or selected PICC.
        Specified by:
        readSingleBlock in interface IICodeCard
        Parameters:
        ProximityCard: - PICC to read the block from. If \a card is NULL then this parameter is ignored and the information is fetched from the PICC priorly selected with #SelectPicc() 12bytes 1byte(flag byte of response)+ 1byte(Data Storage Format Identifier)+ 8byte(UID of the PICC)+ 2byte(CRC of response)
        Returns:
        return 37bytes, null failed. 1byte（flag byte of response）+ 1byte（errorCode）+ 1byte （security status byte）+ 1byte（blocknr）+ 32byte（the content data）+ 1byte（ actual size of \a data）
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • readMultipleBlocks

        public byte[] readMultipleBlocks(byte[] ProximityCard,
                                 byte startblock,
                                 byte count)
                          throws android.os.RemoteException
        Read a multiple blocks from a given or selected PICC.
        Specified by:
        readMultipleBlocks in interface IICodeCard
        Parameters:
        ProximityCard: - PICC to read the block from. If \a card is NULL then this parameter is ignored and the information is fetched from the PICC priorly selected with #SelectPicc() 12bytes 1byte(flag byte of response)+ 1byte(Data Storage Format Identifier)+ 8byte(UID of the PICC)+ 2byte(CRC of response)
        startblock: - number of the first block to read out
        count: - number of blocks to read out.
        Returns:
        return 37bytes, null failed. （1byte（flag byte of response）+ 1byte（errorCode）+ 1byte （security status byte）+ 1byte（blocknr）+ 32byte（the content data）+ 1byte（ actual size of \a data）+）* count
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
